about_the_game:
The official soundtrack from the popular social-deduction game Eville quickly sets the mood for any role players looking for a game. Taking you on a journey from a whimsical, happy marketplace to a dark and foreboding cemetery, the soundtrack includes 16 tracks with a total run time over 41 minutes.

Composed By Alberto Sueri and Johnny Moutzouris.
